statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE preferences->>'category' = 'electronics'
SELECT feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback ILIKE '%good%' LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, feedback, preferences FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preferences -> 'preference1' AS preference1 FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE preferences ->> 'category' = 'A' ORDER BY preference1 ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, jsonb_array_elements_text(preferences -> 'categories') AS category FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, category DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM ProductPreferences;
SELECT product_id, preference_rating FROM ProductPreferences WHERE preference_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, preference_rating FROM ProductPreferences WHERE preference_rating > 3 ORDER BY preference_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_preferences FROM ProductPreferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_preferences > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM preferences WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.name LIKE '%John%' AND preferences.rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, pr.rating FROM customers c JOIN preferences pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pr.rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, preference_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM ProductOfferings WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM CustomerProducts WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id > 10 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM ProductOfferings WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT preference_rating, customer_id FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM ProductOfferings WHERE product_category = 'Clothing');
SELECT * FROM CustomerProducts WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ProductFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM ProductOfferings ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, product_id FROM ProductFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM ProductFeedback WHERE product_id = 5 AND rating > 4;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductOfferings WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND price < 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
